title: Passive generation of bidisperse foam with microbubbles

media:group.media:title: Passive generation of bidisperse foam with microbubbles
media:group.media:description:
This microfluidic device generates bidisperse foam by splitting every second bubble. The alternation is based on a slight change in the distance between the "pincher" bubble and the "wall" bubble downstream. Simulation done in Aphros https://github.com/cselab/aphros .
See article https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.01513 for more applications and details.
Check out the gallery of interactive fluid simulations https://github.com/cselab/aphros/wiki/Aphros-Explorer
